code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./About.scss';import{client}from'../../client';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{const[abouts,setAbouts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const query='*[_type == "abouts"]';client.fetch(query).then(data=>{setAbouts(data);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"head-text",children:["I Know that ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Good Apps"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"means  ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Good Business"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app__profiles",children:abouts.map((about,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{whileInView:{opacity:1},whileHover:{scale:1.1},transition:{duration:0.5,type:'tween'},className:"app__profile-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:about.imgUrl,alt:about.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"bold-text",style:{marginTop:20},children:about.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"p-text",style:{marginTop:10},children:about.description})]},about.title+index))})]});};export default About;
